When **multiplying** by $10$, we shift each digit $1$ place value to the **left**.

When **dividing** by $10$, we shift each digit $1$ place value to the **right**.

When **dividing** by $10$, we shift each digit $1$ place value to the right.

Number | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: |
$500$ | $\searrow\purpleD{5}$ | $\searrow\blueD{0}$ | $\searrow\greenD{0}$  
$500 \div 10$ | | $\purpleD{5}$ |$\blueD{0}$

$\purpleD5\blueD0\greenD0 \div 10=\purpleD5\blueD0$

When **dividing** by $10$, we shift each digit $1$ place value to the right.

Number | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:
$5{,}500$ |$\searrow\goldD{5}$ | $\searrow\purpleD{5}$ | $\searrow\blueD{0}$ | $\searrow\greenD{0}$  
$5{,}500 \div 10$ | |$\goldD{5}$ | $\purpleD{5}$ |$\blueD{0}$

$\goldD5{,}\purpleD5\blueD0\greenD0 \div 10=\goldD5\purpleD5\blueD0$

When **multiplying** by $10$, we shift each digit $1$ place value to the left.

Number | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: |  :-:
$50$| |  $\swarrow\blueD5$ |$\swarrow\greenD{0}$ 
$50 \times 10$| $\blueD5$ | $\greenD0$ | $0$

$\blueD5\greenD \times10=\blueD5\greenD00$
